item.title: Mac app integration and call zipalign, Throw An Error dyld: Library not loaded: @rpath/libc++.dylib
item.description: Recently Packtool(an App create by electron) added autoupdate feature ï¼ŒThe premise is You have to sign your appã€‚ There was something wrong with the android group todayðŸ˜‚ã€‚ The problem was caused by using zipalign(a tool for optimizing the apk) which integration in Packtool optimized the apk. Error: dyld: Library not loaded: @rpath/libc++.dylib Referenced from: myAppName.app/Contents/Resources/tool/mac/zipalign Reason: image not
